room_title: Escape room "Ruin Raiders" by Missing Pieces Escape Games in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: First escape room with my work team and we LOVED it! We played Ruin Raiders and the game kept us on our toes the entire time. Luckily we made it out with just 6 minutes to spare (after some clues). Will definitely be back to play another room!

room_title: Escape room "Ruin Raiders" by Missing Pieces Escape Games in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: Ruin Raiders is the best escape room I've played so far! Theatrical, great story, fun and challenging puzzles, overall amazing room. Can't wait to go play more!

room_title: Escape room "Ruin Raiders" by Missing Pieces Escape Games in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We had a blast in the new Ruin Raiders room. I loved how the puzzles ending up working together in the way they did. This was a challenging but fun room. There were a total of 4 adults and a 15 year old and we figured it out with a minute and a half to spare.

room_title: Escape room "Ruin Raiders" by Missing Pieces Escape Games in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: We had a blast at in the Ruin Raiders room! For our first escape room we didn't know what to expect and we were not disappointed. Creative and challenging, I would HIGHLY recommend this escape room and can't wait to come back and try the other room!

room_title: Escape room "Ruin Raiders" by Missing Pieces Escape Games in Minneapolis - St. Paul
review: By far one of the best escape rooms! Went with a group of 5 for the Ruin Raiders room and had an absolute blast! Had so much fun that we NEEDED to see the other room. We did both rooms in one night. Both rooms were very well thought out and the clues were clever and had a story. Extremely friendly family that works there also! Definitely recommend these rooms to everyone!!!
